org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common

Interface DataItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArduinoDataItem, AttributeWriteHandlerItem, DataItemBase, DataItemBaseChained, DataItemCommand, DataItemInput, DataItemInputChained, DataItemInputCommon, DataItemInputOutputChained, DataItemOutput, DataItemOutputChained, DataItemTargetImpl, DataItemTest1, FactoryMemoryCell, MemoryCellItem, MemoryChainedItem, MemoryDataItem, MemoryDeviceDataitem, MemoryItemChained, MqttDataitem, PlainFileDataItem, PlainFileDataItem, ProxyDataItem, ScheduledDataItem, ScheduledDataItem, StockQuoteItem, SuspendItem, TestItem1, TestItem2, TimeDataItem, TimeDataItem, TimeDataItem, WriteDelayItem, WriteHandlerItem

    • Method Detail

      • getInformation

        DataItemInformation getInformation()

      • readValue

         readValue()
                throws InvalidOperationException
        The read operation of a data item.
        Returns:
        The value read from the subsystem.
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - Raised if "read" is not a valid operation for this item

      • getAttributes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> getAttributes()

      • setListener

        void setListener(ItemListener listener)
        Sets the listener for this item. Set by the controller to which this item is registered. The item has to use the listener provided.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to use or null to disable notification

      • startWriteValue

         startWriteValue(Variant value,
                    OperationParameters operationParameters)
        The write operation of a data item.
        Parameters:
        session - The user session
        value - The value to write to the subsystem
        operationParameters -
        Returns:
        the future to the operation
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - Raised if "write" is not a valid operation for this item
        NullValueException - Raised if a null value was passed but the subsystem does not allow null values to be written
        NotConvertableException - Raised if a value was passed that cannot be converted in a variant type suitable for the subsystem
        OperationException - Raised if the value could not be written due to some subsystem error

      • startSetAttributes

         startSetAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> attributes,
                       OperationParameters operationParameters)
        Start the write attributes operation
        Parameters:
        attributes - attributes to set
        session - The user session
        operationParameters -
        Returns:
        the future to the operation
